message: Yes, you can think of the term "asynchronous" as requiring two points of reference. A background thread may be treated asynchronously by the UI thread, and would be "asynchronous" from the UI thread's perspective. On the other hand, I/O is "asynchronous" from a much broader scope (it would be "asynchronous" from the perspective of *any* thread, or process, or the OS, or the CPU).
